name: Example Question Bank
description: A simple example question bank to demonstrate the format

questions.question: What does HTML stand for?
questions.explanation: HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language, which is the standard markup language for creating web pages.

questions.question: Which of the following are programming languages? (Select TWO)
questions.explanation: Python and JavaScript are programming languages. HTML and CSS are markup and styling languages respectively.

questions.question: What is the purpose of CSS?

options.B: To style and layout web pages
options.C: To add interactivity to web pages

questions.explanation: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is used to style and layout web pages, including colors, fonts, spacing, and responsive design.
